experience: You and Kelli both know Mark Zawacki, Jim Skidmore, and 86 others
You both worked at Charles Schwab
Kelli worked at Charles Schwab before you started
Managing Director, Global Head of Digital Wealth Management, JP Morgan Chase
Senior Vice President, Schwab Trading Services and optionsXpress (a Schwab subsidiary)

As executive leader and general manager of the Trading Services division, I led a group of teams that created and supported the end-to-end client experience for retail investors who actively trade.  Schwab Trading Services is a highly profitable and dynamic business, contributing significant and growing revenue and net new assets to the firm.  The Trading Services division includes optionsXpress (previously ticker symbol OXPS), a Schwab subsidiary that provides retail options and futures brokerage services.  My teams drove business results through creative omni-channel sales and marketing, outstanding phone, chat and in-person service, in-depth education, content and research, and an exceptional digital experience through our mobile, web and desktop trading platforms.
Senior Vice President, Client Experience - Trading Services, Global & Self-Directed Investors

- Executive leader of offer for all of Schwab’s self-directed investors- Identified opportunity, strategy and initial offer to propel retail growth through exceeding the needs of younger (Millennial) investors- Created and executed against a clear strategic target for Trading Services- Drove triple digit growth in new-to-firm clients, and significant revenue, net new asset and Client Promoter Score growth- Significantly enhanced the trading experience across web, mobile and desktop, drawing greatly on capabilities from our acquisition of optionsXpress- Optimized our “core” retail offering by focusing on high value segments and increasing impact of fixed operating expense programs
Vice President, Active Trader, Client Experience and Product Management

- Executive leader of Schwab’s retail active trading business and trading platforms- Led the growing Austin location as Senior Location Leader - Identified opportunity and created strategy that positioned Active Trader as a top-priority based on revenue and profitability growth potential- Drove double digit growth in total accounts and Client Promoter Score increases- Launched StreetSmart Edge, Schwab’s flagship trading platform- Created design and requirements through extensive client research- Partnered effectively with technology to deliver complex trading platform and systems- Key member of due diligence team that identified possible targets for acquisition- Leadership for mobile, trading, Schwab.com redesign, margin, options and cost basis initiatives- Continuously increased responsibility and recognized as a high-potential leader - Selected to attend Chairman’s Club, a national excellence award trip- Recognized for leading one of the most engaged teams in the company (Gallup’s engagement model)

- Responsible for business development, sales and marketing activities- Created the business case and strategy for integrating CyberTrader and Schwab- Oversaw all aspects of the merger and integration of CyberTrader into Schwab- Received Schwab’s highest leadership award - Acknowledged by Corporate Insight for best client communications during a merger

Graduate Student Speaker, Graduation Ceremony, 1997; Centennial Teaching Assistant, for outstanding teaching, 1996; National Research Service Award (National Institute of Mental Health), 1996-1997; National Science Foundation Graduate Fellowship, 1993-1996
Concentration in research design and statistics, and the effect of social situations on attitudes, decision making, behaviors, and preferences

summary: Senior executive with a demonstrated track record of leading dynamic businesses and creating engaged teams who tackle complex challenges and execute strategic plans to drive growth.  Known as a highly accountable, inquisitive, passionate, courageous, client-focused and results-oriented leader who thrives in the intersection between business and technology and leading change.
